subtasks: Rinse each container three times with water.
Transfer rinse water to the spray liquid.
Fill the sprayer tank with water.
Add the rinsed pesticide concentrate to the tank.
Agitate the sprayer to ensure proper mixture.
Verify the solution's consistency and concentration.

tasks.task: Ensuring safety measures for pesticide use.
subtasks: Review website for pesticide use guidelines.
Check for recommended personal protective equipment (PPE).
Dispose of empty pesticide containers responsibly.
Follow local regulations for waste disposal.
Store containers out of reach of children and animals.

tasks.task: Ensuring Safety Measures for Pesticide Use
